WorkItem.ClosedComment: 1) Yes you have to specify the enchants, always2) You are looking at the rwrong thing, switch the chart to enchants > slot and mark them with diamonds3) no, it's not broken
WorkItem.Description:
Version: 2.3.6
 
When using the optimizer in 2.3.6, Rawr tells me that "Greater Spirit" and "Superior Spellpower" are missing items. The items which these enchants are on are selected as available and equipped. Exchanging "Superior Spellpower" for "Greater Spellower" tells me that "Greater Spellpower" is a missing item. So, since enchants can't be modified as available or something, I'm guessing they're broken.
 
Thanks in advance!

Comments.Message: Okay, didn't know what. So I checked. Enchants on those two items were marked as "Any" available (green diamond). Still it doesn't work with the Optimizer unless I specify the enchant in the item list (green diamond with red dot). I never had to do that with any of the previous releases and there was no change pointed out in the release notes. So am I missing something here or is it indeed broken? It worked with 2.3.5 without specifying the enchants :/

You CAN mark them as available, please read the documentation on the optimizer.



** Closed by Jothay 1/18/2010 8:12 PM

Still it doesn't work with the Optimizer unless I specify the enchant in the item list (green diamond with red dot). I never had to do that with any of the previous releases and there was no change pointed out in the release notes. So am I missing something here or is it indeed broken?
